Hyperliquid reveals its token unlock plan  DEX Hyperliquid will release 1.2M team tokens monthly, starting Jan 6, with unlocks set for the 6th of every month over roughly two years.  With $HYPE  trading above $25, analysts say the transparent, predictable vesting could help support long-term price stability.
JUST IN: Hyperliquid will unstake 1.2M  $HYPE on Jan 6 for team vesting distribution, with monthly unlocks every 6th announced via Discord.

TradFi onchain Prediction Market?!  First it was $HYPE  making DEXes work as simple as CEXes. Now itâ€™s $LMTS  making onchain prediction markets for everything.  Limitless is building a bridge between TradFi & DeFi by reimagining high-volume TradFi instruments like zero-day-to-expiry (0DTE) options as simple, onchain prediction markets.  This approach attracts TradFi liquidity and users to DeFi while leveraging blockchain's transparency, low costs, and accessibility.   With $700M+ in cumulative volume already, Limitless are betting on this convergence to scale from billions to trillions.   #Altcoin Season#
